cn discover ACCOUNT
cn discover ACTOR [on STORE]

Discovers the actor group the given account belongs to. Only active group members are discovered.

cn discover ACCOUNT*
cn discover ACTOR* on STORE

Same as above, but starts discovery with multiple accounts. All accounts must belong to the same actor group.

Note that this rarely makes sense. The actor group discovery algorithm reliably discovers an actor group from a single account.

cn discover me

Discovers your own actor group.

… and remember as TEXT

The discovered actor group is remembered as TEXT. See "cn help remember" for details.

cn discover ACTORGROUP

Updates a previously remembered actor group.

cn show ACTORGROUP

Shows a previously discovered and remembered actor group.

Syntax

Open
